channel.title: Need Help Wid Ma InterNet
channel.description:
hi guys i need your help again :D
when i go on the internet around an hour later it turns off then on then off then on constanly until it makes the connection limited
Theres 4people connected to this internet throught wires not wireless
how'd do i fix this problem (i cant dissconect an1 of the network or my dad will kick my ass)

item.title: Need Help Wid Ma InterNet
item.dc:creator: @Nashiu Nashiu
item.description:
@Nashiu wrote:

You work for Comcast?

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Wid Ma InterNet

Thanks for backing us up nashiu. Appreciated =)

item.title: Need Help Wid Ma InterNet
item.dc:creator: @Nashiu Nashiu
item.description:
@Nashiu wrote:

I’d most likely assume number 3 on his list.
Are you using Comcast? Because if you are, they suck ass. There will be these times where their whole internet is offline to everyone for like 12-14 hours.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Wid Ma InterNet
item.dc:creator: @MidGuardian MidGuardian
item.description:
@MidGuardian wrote:

i think that

  1. someones taking the wire in and out
  2. because there is 4 people connected, it will lagg and depending on how many processes it might restart the connection because you are using the limit.
  3. just too many people connecting to 1 modem lol

Read full topic
